column4: after selecting language, i choose install on hdd and then screen goes kinda blank.. with some verticle lines...(seems like its running  on 4 bit colors)
first i thought it was problem of ubuntu, then i tried installing Mint, but it has similar problem
would you feel confident on using a pseudo-GUI to install?
it might be that your problems with the install are limited to only the install phase and using alternate disc to install might work better
